channel.title: Shops, npcs, how do i make them,
channel.description:
I want to add jad to varrock castle court yard, how would i do this? And if possible how do i make it so he attacks anyone that gets near?
Also i want to add santa clause to varrock center, i want him to be able to sell partyhats for 100k, how would i do this?
Please explain in detail where the codes should go, thanks
